sentences.english: The pro rowers from Bristol usually row in a mixed four team.
sentences.chinese: 來自親賽艇運動員布里斯托爾通常排在混合四隊。
我叫莉莉，是達里加爾的老婆，瑪吉的媽。

sentences.english: Project that started so that Vittel may tie to music.
sentences.chinese: 項目，開始使維特爾可綁音樂。

sentences.english: I'm sure Marr's right that newspapers as we know them are not going to survive.
sentences.chinese: 我可以肯定馬爾的正確，如我們所知報紙將不復存在。

sentences.english: Sometimes Gaskell was happy with that and sometimes she wasn't.
sentences.chinese: 蓋斯凱爾有時滿意，有時則不盡然。
“怎麼樣，”騰格拉爾說，“你見到他了嗎？”

sentences.english: "This is where the story starts, " Ms. Lovell said.
sentences.chinese: 羅薇爾女士說，“這就是故事開始的地方。”

sentences.english: Mr Holzer, ever the scientist, dismissed most of that.
sentences.chinese: 菏澤爾先生很有科學家精神地排除了多數情況。

sentences.english: Bristol is in the west of England.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托爾位於英蘭西。

sentences.english: I was late signing up because of my job.
sentences.chinese: 我報名晚了是果爲爾在農息。

sentences.english: Yule sat behind a desk, reading The Wall Street Journal.
sentences.chinese: 於爾先生坐在辦公桌後面看《華爾街日報》。

sentences.english: 'Cause I've spent half my life out there, you wouldn't disagree.
sentences.chinese: 由於爾在表面功了泰半的時光，你們不會阻擋的。

sentences.english: Raziel is officially known as the Chief of the Supreme Mysteries.
sentences.chinese: 拉吉爾是衆所周知最高的神祕主宰。

sentences.english: The man was an undercover deputy from Iredell County Sheriff's Office.
sentences.chinese: 這名男子是愛戴爾郡警局的臥底警員。

sentences.english: I can not thinking about you .
sentences.chinese: 涐不能停止対爾的思念。

sentences.english: Valeera runs up, hugs Spike, and thanks him for saving Broll.
sentences.chinese: 瓦蕾拉跑上來抱住狼牙，感激他救了布羅爾。
